SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_interface.svi)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_transaction.sv)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_define.sv)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_generator.sv)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_driver.sv)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_monitor.sv)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_scoreboard.sv)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/packet_env.sv)

SET(PKT_SUBENV_FILES ${PKT_SUBENV_FILES} PARENT_SCOPE)
SET(PKT_SUBENV_INC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
